languages.text:
Forge world characters choose one augmentation system from the following list:
-<indent=5%>Subskin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armour{/g}: grants +<u>(5 + 2 × TGH bonus)</u>% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Locomotion System: grants +<u>(AGI bonus / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +<u>(2 × AGI bonus)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Analytics System: grants +<u>(10 + INT bonus)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Персонаж с мира-кузни выбирает одну систему аугментов из списка:
-<indent=5%>Подкожная {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g}: +<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g})</u>% к броне.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Система перемещения: +<u>(бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +<u>(2 × бонус ЛВК)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Система аналитики: +<u>(10 + бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}ИНТ{/g})</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Forge World characters choose one implant system from the following list:
-<indent=5%>Subskin Armour: grants <u>(5 + 2 × TGH bonus)</u>% armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Locomotion System: grants <u>(AGI bonus / 2)</u> movement points and <u>(2 × AGI bonus)</u>% dodge.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Analytics System: grants <u>(10 + INT bonus)</u>% critical hit chance.</indent>

languages.text:
Fabrikweltcharaktere wählen ein Augmentationssystem aus der folgenden Liste:
-<indent=5%>Subdermale {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}: Gewährt +<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % Rüstung.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Fortbewegungssystem: Gewährt +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-Bonus / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und +<u>(2 × BEW-Bonus)</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Analytisches System: Gewährt +<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}-Bonus)</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
Les personnages des mondes forges choisissent un système d'augmentations dans la liste suivante :
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} Sous-Cutanée : confère +<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}E{/g})</u> % d'armure.</indent>

languages.text:
铸造世界的角色可从以下几项植入物系统中选择一项：
- <indent=5%>皮下{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}：获得+<u>（5+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%护甲加成。</indent>
- <indent=5%>移动系统：获得+<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}加值/2）</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}加成与+<u>（2×敏捷加值）</u>%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}加成。</indent>
- <indent=5%>分析系统：获得+<u>（10+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}加值）</u>%{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}加成。</indent>

languages.text:
Los personajes de mundos forja eligen un sistema de aumentos de la siguiente lista:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armadura{/g} subdérmica: concede +<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g})</u> % de armadura.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Sistema locomotor: concede +<u>(bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y +<u>(2 × bonificación por AGI)</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Sistema analítico: concede +<u>(10 + bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
工業惑星のキャラクターは、以下のリストからインプラントシステムを1つ選択する：
-<indent=5%>サブスキン{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}：アーマーを+<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%増加させる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>運動システム：{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} ボーナス / 2)</u>、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}が+<u>(2 × AGI ボーナス)</u>%増加する。</indent>
-<indent=5%>分析システム：{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル命中率{/g}が+<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} ボーナス)</u>%増加する。</indent>
